parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> The statement is executed when the trigger or waypoint is activated and the effects are launched depending on the result.

*If the result is a [[Boolean|boolean]] and [[true]], the effect is launched.
*If the result is an [[object]], the effect is launched if the result is the player or the player vehicle.
*If the result is an [[Array|array]], the effect is launched if the result contains the player or the player vehicle.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> trigger '''setEffectCondition''' statement

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> statement: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> waypoint '''setEffectCondition''' statement

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Waypoint]] - [[Array]] format [[Waypoint]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> statement: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_triggerObj [[setEffectCondition]] "thisList";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[createTrigger]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofpe</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
